title: Service management
pageDescription: A Kubernetes cluster consists of master nodes and groups of worker nodes. This section explains the operations that can be performed on the cluster and its nodes.
shortDescription: Supported operations with the cluster and its nodes
metaDescription: Cloud Containers: operations that can be performed with the Kubernetes cluster and its nodes
